reason: Question asks about eligibility for 순회교원수당. Answer accurately provides 지급근거 (교육부 훈령 제237호) and 지급대상 from page 109 source. Content matches source markdown.
Vague question ('가장 중요한 점은 무엇인가요') not answerable from source. Answer is identical dump of 지급근거/지급대상 as q_2_0162 without identifying any 'most important point'. Duplicate answer.

Question asks for '구체적인 적용 사례' (specific application cases) but source contains no cases. Answer repeats same 지급근거/지급대상 rules without providing any 사례. Question-answer mismatch and duplicate answer with q_2_0162.

Hallucination: answer includes fabricated '목적: 농어촌 지역 순회근무의 어려움을 보상하고 농어촌 교육의 질을 향상시키기 위함' which does not appear in source pages 109 or 110. Also source page listed as 110 but 지급근거 content is from page 109.
Source mismatch: answer content about 수당 지급대상 is from page 109, but source is listed as page 110 with source.text about 제3조(정의) definitions which is unrelated content. Wrong page attribution.
Good specific question about 농어촌학교 definition. Answer correctly provides the legal definition from page 110: 유아교육법/초중등교육법에 따른 학교 중 농어촌에 있는 학교. Matches source.

Hallucination: answer fabricates specific details not in source - '학기당 17주 기준', '1일 최대 2만원', '17주 초과 시 학교 자체 예산으로 지급', '소급 지급' etc. None of these appear in pages 109 or 110. Source page 110 text is about 제3조(정의), unrelated to 여비.
Question asks what the 특별법 is. Answer correctly provides 제3조(정의) content from page 110 defining 농어촌 and 농어촌학교. Matches source markdown exactly.
Duplicate of q_2_0182. Nearly identical question ('정의가 어떻게 되나요' vs '무엇인가요') with virtually identical answer content from same source.

Question-answer mismatch: question asks about 「농업·농촌 및 식품산업 기본법」 concept, but answer discusses 「농어업인 삶의 질 향상 및 농어촌지역 개발촉진에 관한 특별법」 instead. Page 110 has the 기본법 제3조 defining '농촌' (읍·면의 지역 등) but this content is not used in the answer.
